2.title: ETV and others
2.post:
Hey again, been doing some stuff these days. I just experimented with Unity 3d and tried to re-remeber some of Unity's C#.
I've also made an online tierlist builder, made from pure js. (why didnt I use jQuery...)
{frumsTierlistExample.png;150}I've had some troubles getting the drag&drop to work, but I think it ended up pretty well.
...Will probably keep updating it with some very much needed QoL features, so stay tuned for more!
Oh yeah, I'm getting better at art :>

8.title: Happy new year!
8.post:
2024 has been a wild year, between graduating, finding a job, developing a game,
learning new stuff, and changing zones of comfort, I'm exhausted.
I managed to do at least half the things I set out on doing, which is great!

Right now, I have quite some stuff cooking with ADC, and also sketching ideas for another game.
Life is great, and I'm working towards finding myself (or a sense, of what I am) more closely.

Lastly, as I've said, a year ago, 2025 is my year.
You'll hear from me soon enough.
[Discord Server]

9.title: Wishlist ADC on Steam!
9.post:
{../adc/ADCLibraryLogo.png;150} We have a Steam page now!

I'm expecting to release A Directionless Cycle around Q2 this year,
so I'd very much appreciate if you could wishlist the game on Steam.

I've also updated the demo for (hopefully) the last time!
It is playable on the Steam page only.

Check it out here:
[A Directionless Cycle - Steam]

10.title: Pride + Dev Update
10.post:
Been a while! I've been very busy at work with A Directionless Cycle and Polymorphite.
We're close to releasing with ADC and I REALLY wanna take a break, it's been quite a long development time.

Music isn't looking too well (it looks like it's not really my thing, somehow), but I'll still try to have something down for release.
...Maybe one or two tracks.

Aside from that, happy pride month!

{../flags/BI.png;70}I wish everyone an awesome month, you are valid and loved <3

11.title: Bird Update
11.post:
Hey y'all. I've wanted to make a birthday post for a while now, but I had some "personal issues" at that time.

I'll start with the good! Thank you SO, SO MUCH for everyone that's played A Directionless Cycle and shared their journey through the game.
It's made me so happy to see everyone enjoying their time.

Currently I'm working on multiple small projects, with no release deadline. They'll both be free aswell.

As for the bad... I'm very burnt out at the moment, solo dev/indie dev doesn't pay the bills. It's been hell to find a job in the game development industry, and it doesn't help that more than half of your applications are rejected without reply, or after a gauntlet.

That's mostly it, just going through some stuff. Thank you for being there <3

12.title: New year, same me.
12.post:
Happy new year! This'll be a brief post.

In short, 2025 was my year! I've accomplished most of the stuff I've set out to do, despite hardships and roadblocks.
These last few months have been rough, but we'll get there <3

As far as projects go... It's been slow! Though, I do have some stuff to show off: {EOSCliTease.png;850}...I'd rather keep everything "secret" as of now, as most of it is just development textures.
I'll make sure to show off any dev related stuff afterwards!

And again, happy new year! I'm looking forward to this one.
With love, Lumi!
